title: After the White Moonlight Came Back, the Stand-in Fell Into Unemployment Crisis - Novel Updates
tags: Contracts   Cute Story   Inferiority Complex   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Short Story
author: 项绿瓜
description:
Next Door is, “The Stand-in Refuses to Become a Regular” an extended version.

A year after the Stand-in became a keep man, the President’s White Moonlight returned and the Stand-in fell into an unemployment crisis!>
